mapper.insert: INSERT INTO debit_card (card_number, owner_id, balance, password) VALUES (#{cardNumber},#{id}, 0, #{password})
mapper.update: UPDATE debit_card SET balance = balance + #{amount} WHERE card_number = #{cardNumber}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM card_owner WHERE id = #{id} AND password = #{password}
